token.name: root_permission
token.description: Carry out any action on any site.

token.name: create_remove_settings
token.description: Create, remove, and edit settings themselves.

token.name: modify_system_settings
token.description: Modify values of system settings.

token.name: add_new_pages
token.description: Add pages to the sitemap.

token.name: remove_pages
token.description: Remove pages from the sitemap.

token.name: create_remove_models
token.description: Create, remove, and edit item classes.

token.name: create_remove_properties
token.description: Create, remove and edit item class properties.

token.name: add_items
token.description: Add items to existing item classes.

token.name: delete_items
token.description: Delete items from existing item classes.

token.name: modify_page_properties
token.description: Modify the basic properties of pages.

token.name: modify_draft_pages
token.description: Modify draft versions of the pages in the CMS.

token.name: approve_page_changes
token.description: Approve pages marked as ready for approval.

token.name: see_advanced_page_edit_ui
token.description: See the page elements tree in its complex form.

token.name: modify_user_permissions
token.description: Edit the permissions of other users.

token.name: modify_items
token.description: Modify CMS Items that do not necessarily belong to the user.

token.name: approve_item_changes
token.description: Approve changes to all items.

token.name: publish_approved_pages
token.description: Publish pages that have been modified and approved.

token.name: publish_approved_items
token.description: Publish items that have been modified and approved.

token.name: publish_all_pages
token.description: Publish changed pages even if they have not been approved.

token.name: publish_all_items
token.description: Publish changed items even if they have not been approved.

token.name: modify_site_parameters
token.description: Edit site parameters.

token.name: site_access
token.description: Access a site. See it listed in the list of available sites.

token.name: modify_other_user_details
token.description: Edit the details of other users.

token.name: grant_site_access
token.description: Grant another user access to a site.

token.name: grant_global_permissions
token.description: Grant permissions that will persist across all sites.

token.name: create_sites
token.description: Create new sites.

token.name: modify_assets
token.description: Modify existing media assets that do not belong to the user.

token.name: delete_assets
token.description: Delete media assets that do not belong to the user.

token.name: create_assets
token.description: Add new media to the system.

token.name: clear_pages_cache
token.description: Clear the pages cache.

token.name: modify_assets
token.description: Modify existing media assets that do not belong to the user.

token.name: create_users
token.description: Create other user accounts.
